content:
i am working on rustc's mipsr6 supports now. however i faced a problem when resolving generating metadata error in compiling rustc. it just like this message below what tidy said:

tidy error: Dependencies not explicitly permitted:
* ahash 0.7.4 (registry+https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index)
* 361 features
some tidy checks failed

i found a way seems can fix this problem, a ahash to a explicitly permitted list in tidy. but i am not sure whether i can do this.

Feel free to add it to the whitelist so that the rest of the testing can run, whomever is assigned to your PR should make sure that the whitelist addition is okay before they approve. It looks like it's an additional dependency of the newer version of object? It'd probably be fine in that case.
